channel.title: Whonix 13.0.0.1.4 stable upgrade released!
channel.description:
Originally published at: https://www.whonix.org/blog/whonix-13-0-0-1-4
Qubes-Whonix: Either start with fresh templates. I.e. uninstall qubes-template-whonix-gw and qubes-template-whonix-ws. Then, to install, run in dom0: 
sudo qubes-dom0-update --enablerepo=qubes-tempates-community qubes-template-whonix-gw qubes-template-whonix-ws
Or you can also upgrade from Whonix's repository. Please refer to the following instructions: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes/Update
Non-Qubes-Whonix: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download Or you can also upgrade from Whonix's repository. Please refer to the following instructions: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Update
major Whonix 13 -> 13.0.0.1.4 changes:
  • includes CVE-2016-1252 fix
  • cosmetic apt-get server file size warning fix

item.title: Whonix 13.0.0.1.4 stable upgrade released!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Originally published at: https://www.whonix.org/blog/whonix-13-0-0-1-4

Qubes-Whonix:

Either start with fresh templates. I.e. uninstall qubes-template-whonix-gw and qubes-template-whonix-ws. Then, to install, run in dom0:

sudo qubes-dom0-update --enablerepo=qubes-tempates-community qubes-template-whonix-gw qubes-template-whonix-ws

Or you can also upgrade from Whonix’s repository. Please refer to the following instructions:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes/Update

Non-Qubes-Whonix:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download

Or you can also upgrade from Whonix’s repository. Please refer to the following instructions:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Update

major Whonix 13 -> 13.0.0.1.4 changes:

  • includes CVE-2016-1252 fix
  • cosmetic apt-get server file size warning fix

Read full topic
